nodes.documentation: @title A contract that can be paused by its owner
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor
@param _owner The account which controls this contract.

@notice Change the paused state of the contract
@dev Only the contract owner may call this.
nodes.name: setPaused

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "This action cannot be performed while the contract is paused"

arguments.value: This action cannot be performed while the contract is paused

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "This action cannot be performed while the contract is paused"
